tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE telecom_locations (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(255),
  latitude DECIMAL(10, 8),
  longitude DECIMAL(11, 8),
  owner VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE telecom_status (
  status_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_id INT,
  status VARCHAR(20),
  last_updated TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES telecom_locations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE telecom_locations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(255),
  latitude DECIMAL(10, 6),
  longitude DECIMAL(10, 6),
  status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE zoning_regulations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  regulation_name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP,
  created_by VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE environmental_compliance (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_id INT,
  regulation_id INT,
  compliance_status VARCHAR(50),
  last_checked DATE
)

CREATE TABLE zoning_regulations (
 zone_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 jurisdiction VARCHAR(100),
 description TEXT,
 start_date DATE,
 end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE permits (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tower_id INT,
    permit_number VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);
